page.title:
How to Read a Corps Permit
How to Read a Corps Permit
page.enlisting:
• used only for federally funded projects • Two Types of Permits • Both have Plans and Conditions • Nationwide Permit (NWP) : issued nationally • authorizes a specific type of activity with • Usually NWP 3 (Maintenance) or • NWP 23 (Categorical Exclusion) • Individual Permit (IP) • Includes modifications • used only for federally funded projects
• used only for federally funded projects
